text: Hello Everyone! we are  looking for SEO specialist in a freelance / contractor role. We generally need help with SEO strategy on website builds so it would be a per project basis. Please DM directly and I can provide details and we can chat. Thanks! <http://1406consulting.com|1406consulting.com>
We are also looking for a HubSpot strategist, so if you know of anyone that would be interested they can fill out an app here: <https://www.1406consulting.com/HubSpot-strategist>

Looking for a wordpress dev to make a few modules for a wordpress site using ACF Pro. Modules will be awesome and dynamic. Design is being wrapped today. Project will be ready to start tomorrow. I can provide you with an export of wordpress site. You can develop locally or on your staging server. 2 1/2 weeks of timeline. If you have availability, please DM me. I’ll share the design I have, and you can give me a ballpark estimate / time / cost and if you can meet the timeline and we’ll see where to go from there.
I’d love to help again <@U25PYL3Q8>, but my team is pretty jammed for the next few weeks :disappointed:
<@U25PYL3Q8> I am very interested. Can we chat directly?
